News.headline: Hospitality Special: Emirates FA Cup Dagenham & Redbridge vs FC Halfiax Town
News.page_title: Hospitality Special: Emirates FA Cup Dagenham & Redbridge vs FC Halfiax Town
News.URL_keywords: Emirates FA Cup Dagenham & Redbridge vs FC Halfiax Town
News.short_description: Deadline to book for our Hospitality special against FC Halifax Town is Wednesday 2nd November, 11am dont miss out!
News.description:
After our 3-1 win over Wealdstone in the fourth qualifying round of the Emirates FA Cup we would like to offer home and away fans the same special to watch the Daggers in style this November, with a special on our hospitality packages for our FA Cup 1st round Qualifying fixture against FC Halifax Town on Saturday 5th November reduced to just £30.00 for adults and £25.00 for concessions (usually £65.00).

A massive saving is on offer for any fans wanting to watch the Daggers in style this November. The match day hospitality package includes the following:

·Three course carvery meal
·Complimentary match day programme and team sheet
·Half time refreshments
·Seat in the sponsors box

The game kicks off at 3.00pm with lunch served from 1pm

For more information or to make a booking please contact the clubs commercial department on commercial@daggers.co.uk or call 0208 592 1549 Ext. 33.

Deadline to Book: Wednesday 2nd November, 11am
